title: I would like to invest 5000 per month in HDFC children fund for my daughter. is this a good idea? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no fund like HDFC children fund. HDFC mutual fund has a fund called : HDFC Children's gift fund. Are you referring to the same fund? You need to specify the exact fund name, duration of the investment & purpose of investment. You daughter could be 2 year old & your would want to create a corpus for her over next 20 years or your daughter could be 5 & you could be planning a Disney land trip after 3 years. So it depends on why do you want to invest & for how long before suggesting whether its a good idea or not. There could be better alternatives available for this 5000Rs.

Investing in Hdfc children fund is a good option with investment option but you will be having min of 3yrs of lock you can invest in some small & mid cap funds such as Franklin India smaller cos fund Dspblackrock micro cap fund Mire asset emerging bluechip fund Birla SL pure value fund These fund would be giving you a return of 10- 12% and is recommendable for your daughter
